game.name: DCS: F-14A Zone 5 Campaign
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 캡션 이용 가능, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원
game.shortDescription: Dave 'Bio' Baranek entered the US Navy in 1979 and enjoyed a successful and satisfying 20-year career with 2,500 F-14 Tomcat flight hours and 688 carrier landings.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dave 'Bio' Baranek entered the US Navy in 1979 and enjoyed a successful and satisfying 20-year career with 2,500 F-14 Tomcat flight hours and 688 carrier landings.
